9 #ifndef V8PP_UTILITY_HPP_INCLUDED
10 #define V8PP_UTILITY_HPP_INCLUDED

12 #include <functional>
13 #include <string>
14 #include <tuple>
15 #include <type_traits>
16 
17 namespace v8pp { namespace detail {
18 
19 template<typename T>
20 struct tuple_tail;
21 
22 template<typename Head, typename... Tail>
23 struct tuple_tail<std::tuple<Head, Tail...>>
24 {
25  using type = std::tuple<Tail...>;
26 };
27 
29 //
30 // Function traits
31 //
32 template<typename F>
33 struct function_traits;
34 
35 template<typename R, typename ...Args>
36 struct function_traits<R (Args...)>
37 {
38  using return_type = R;
39  using arguments = std::tuple<Args...>;
40 };
41 
42 // function pointer
43 template<typename R, typename ...Args>
44 struct function_traits<R (*)(Args...)>
45  : function_traits<R (Args...)>
46 {
47  using pointer_type = R (*)(Args...);
48 };
49 
50 // member function pointer
51 template<typename C, typename R, typename ...Args>
52 struct function_traits<R (C::*)(Args...)>
53  : function_traits<R (C&, Args...)>
54 {
55  template<typename D = C>
56  using pointer_type = R (D::*)(Args...);
57 };
58 
59 // const member function pointer
60 template<typename C, typename R, typename ...Args>
61 struct function_traits<R (C::*)(Args...) const>
62  : function_traits<R (C const&, Args...)>
63 {
64  template<typename D = C>
65  using pointer_type = R (D::*)(Args...) const;
66 };
67 
68 // volatile member function pointer
69 template<typename C, typename R, typename ...Args>
70 struct function_traits<R (C::*)(Args...) volatile>
71  : function_traits<R (C volatile&, Args...)>
72 {
73  template<typename D = C>
74  using pointer_type = R (D::*)(Args...) volatile;
75 };
76 
77 // const volatile member function pointer
78 template<typename C, typename R, typename ...Args>
79 struct function_traits<R (C::*)(Args...) const volatile>
80  : function_traits<R (C const volatile&, Args...)>
81 {
82  template<typename D = C>
83  using pointer_type = R (D::*)(Args...) const volatile;
84 };
85 
86 // member object pointer
87 template<typename C, typename R>
88 struct function_traits<R (C::*)>
89  : function_traits<R (C&)>
90 {
91  template<typename D = C>
92  using pointer_type = R (D::*);
93 };
94 
95 // const member object pointer
96 template<typename C, typename R>
97 struct function_traits<const R (C::*)>
98  : function_traits<R (C const&)>
99 {
100  template<typename D = C>
101  using pointer_type = const R (D::*);
102 };
103 
104 // volatile member object pointer
105 template<typename C, typename R>
106 struct function_traits<volatile R (C::*)>
107  : function_traits<R (C volatile&)>
108 {
109  template<typename D = C>
110  using pointer_type = volatile R (D::*);
111 };
112 
113 // const volatile member object pointer
114 template<typename C, typename R>
115 struct function_traits<const volatile R (C::*)>
116  : function_traits<R (C const volatile&)>
117 {
118  template<typename D = C>
119  using pointer_type = const volatile R (D::*);
120 };
121 
122 // function object, std::function, lambda
123 template<typename F>
124 struct function_traits
125 {
126  static_assert(!std::is_bind_expression<F>::value,
127  "std::bind result is not supported yet");
128 private:
129  using callable_traits = function_traits<decltype(&F::operator())>;
130 public:
131  using return_type = typename callable_traits::return_type;
132  using arguments = typename tuple_tail<typename callable_traits::arguments>::type;
133 };
134 
135 template<typename F>
136 struct function_traits<F&> : function_traits<F> {};
137 
138 template<typename F>
139 struct function_traits<F&&> : function_traits<F> {};
140 
141 template<typename F>
142 using is_void_return = std::is_same<void,
143  typename function_traits<F>::return_type>;
144 
145 template<typename F, bool is_class>
146 struct is_callable_impl
147  : std::is_function<typename std::remove_pointer<F>::type>
148 {
149 };
150 
151 template<typename F>
152 struct is_callable_impl<F, true>
153 {
154 private:
155  struct fallback { void operator()(); };
156  struct derived : F, fallback {};
157 
158  template<typename U, U> struct check;
159 
160  template<typename>
161  static std::true_type test(...);
162 
163  template<typename C>
164  static std::false_type test(check<void(fallback::*)(), &C::operator()>*);
165 
166  using type = decltype(test<derived>(0));
167 public:
168  static const bool value = type::value;
169 };
170 
171 template<typename F>
172 using is_callable = std::integral_constant<bool,
173  is_callable_impl<F, std::is_class<F>::value>::value>;
174 
175 #if (__cplusplus > 201402L) || (defined(_MSC_FULL_VER) && _MSC_FULL_VER >= 190023918)
176 using std::index_sequence;
177 using std::make_index_sequence;
178 #else
179 //
181 // integer_sequence
182 //
183 template<typename T, T... I>
184 struct integer_sequence
185 {
186  using type = T;
187  static size_t size() { return sizeof...(I); }
188 
189  template<T N>
190  using append = integer_sequence<T, I..., N>;
191 
192  using next = append<sizeof...(I)>;
193 };
194 
195 template<typename T, T Index, size_t N>
196 struct sequence_generator
197 {
198  using type = typename sequence_generator<T, Index - 1, N - 1>::type::next;
199 };
200 
201 template<typename T, T Index>
202 struct sequence_generator<T, Index, 0ul>
203 {
204  using type = integer_sequence<T>;
205 };
206 
207 template<size_t... I>
208 using index_sequence = integer_sequence<size_t, I...>;
209 
210 template<typename T, T N>
211 using make_integer_sequence = typename sequence_generator<T, N, N>::type;
212 
213 template<size_t N>
214 using make_index_sequence = make_integer_sequence<size_t, N>;
215 #endif
216 
218 class type_info
219 {
220 public:
221  std::string const& name() const { return name_; }
222  bool operator==(type_info const& other) const { return name_ == other.name_; }
223  bool operator!=(type_info const& other) const { return name_ != other.name_; }
224 private:
225  template<typename T> friend type_info type_id();
226  type_info(char const* name, size_t size)
227  : name_(name, size)
228  {
229  }
230  std::string name_;
231 };
232 
235 template<typename T>
236 type_info type_id()
237 {
238 #if defined(_MSC_VER)
239  #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION __FUNCSIG__
240  #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX "class v8pp::detail::type_info __cdecl v8pp::detail::type_id<"
241  #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_SUFFIX ">(void)"
242 #elif defined(__clang__) || defined(__GNUC__)
243  #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION __PRETTY_FUNCTION__
244  #if !defined(__clang__)
245  #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX "v8pp::detail::type_info v8pp::detail::type_id() [with T = "
246  #else
247  #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX "v8pp::detail::type_info v8pp::detail::type_id() [T = "
248  #endif
249  #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_SUFFIX "]"
250 #else
251  #error "Unknown compiler"
252 #endif
253 
254 #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_LEN (sizeof(V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION) - 1)
255 #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX_LEN (sizeof(V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX) - 1)
256 #define V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_SUFFIX_LEN (sizeof(V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_SUFFIX) - 1)
257 
258  return type_info(V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION + V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX_LEN,
259  V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_LEN - V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX_LEN - V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_SUFFIX_LEN);
260 
261 #undef V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION
262 #undef V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX
263 #undef V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_SUFFFIX
264 #undef V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_LEN
265 #undef V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_PREFIX_LEN
266 #undef V8PP_PRETTY_FUNCTION_SUFFFIX_LEN
267 }
268 
269 }} // namespace v8pp::detail
270 
271 #endif // V8PP_UTILITY_HPP_INCLUDED

friend type_info type_id()
